neu:sampleInfo.neu:title: Server tutorials
neu:sampleInfo.neu:description: Server tutorials demonstrate how to perform simple server tasks using SDK API.[br] The following tutorials are provided:[br] [b]SendTask[/b] - demonstrates how to send a task to matching server and wait for result.[br] [b]ServerAdmin[/b] - demonstrates how to administrate matching server.[br] [b]ServerDatabase[/b] - demonstrates how to use Accelerator database (perform insert and delete operations).[br] [b]ServerStatus[/b] - displays various information about matching server and nodes.[br]
